short_info: Park View rooms reflect an elegant Manhattan residence featuring three-fixture bathrooms and stunning views of Central Park, these 320 square foot rooms are situated on floors 12-39.
room_features:
Room Features

Park View rooms reflect an elegant Manhattan residence featuring three-fixture bathrooms and stunning views of Central Park, these 320 square foot rooms are situated on floors 12-39.

Bed & Bath Experience

The Park View room is famed for its panoramic views of Central Park and the city.  Tastefully designed with a soft color palette contains a king sized bed, chaise and a nightstand, Bose Wave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. An executive writing desk and chair is located next to the bed.  An armchair with side table, 40” wall mounted TV and console with minibar is located across the bed. The marble bathroom features a pedestal sink, glass enclosed shower, bathtub, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro amenities.
service_amenities:
Our service includes 24 hour white gloved elevator attendants, Complimentary hotel Jaguar service subject to availability, an Award-winning Les Clefs d'Or Concierge team to assist guests.

Our In-room comforts feature Complimentary high speed wi-fi for up to 5 devices, 24 hour in-room dining service, Housekeeping daily service twice, Overnight complimentary shoe shine, Plush terry cloth robes & Pierre slippers, Exclusive Etro toiletries, On site 24-hour valet and hand-laundry services, Complimentary dog amenities (for pets up to 15 pounds), Complimentary online newspapers and magazines on check in.  For a full list of our guest services and amenities click here.
additional-info: Featuring three-fixture bathrooms and stunning views of Central Park, our 320 square foot Park View rooms reflect an elegant Manhattan residence. These rooms are situated on floors 12-39.
